DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess field effect ( FE ) ABO ONA label unit dose ( 1:1 unit ) , compare sweat gland muscle activity .
DOC.brief_title: Fields Of Effects Of Two Commercial Preparations Of Botulinum Toxin Type A At Equal Labeled Unit Doses
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-center , randomize , double-blind study . All participant recruit research center Porto Alegre , Brazil , provide write informed consent . This study approve local Ethics Committee Associação Hospitalar Moinhos de Vento Good Clinical Practices , Declaration Helsinki protocols national regulation follow . The main inclusion criterion : female subject age 18 60 year ; presence moderate severe forehead wrinkle side maximum contraction frontalis muscle accord Wrinkle Severity Scores ( WSS ) ( Hexsel et al. , 2012 ) ; positive sweating Minor 's Test ( Minor , 1927 ) score III V Sweat Intensity Visual Scale ( Hexsel et al. , 2010 ) .
DOC.criteria: female subject age 18 60 year ; presence moderate severe forehead wrinkle side maximum contraction frontalis muscle accord Wrinkle Severity Scores ( WSS ) ( Hexsel et al. , 2012 ) ; positive sweating Minor 's Test ( Minor , 1927 ) score III V Sweat Intensity Visual Scale ( Hexsel et al. , 2010 ) .
